verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise the LORD, O my soul.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! Let my whole soul praise the LORD.

verses.kjv: While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
verses.ct: As long as I'm alive, I will praise the LORD. I will sing to my God for every moment of my existence.

verses.kjv: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
verses.ct: Don't place your confidence in powerful leaders or in any human being — they cannot save you.

verses.kjv: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
verses.ct: When their breath leaves them, they return to the ground. On that same day, all their plans come to nothing.

verses.kjv: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:
verses.ct: How blessed is the person whose help comes from the God of Jacob, whose hope rests in the LORD their God —

verses.kjv: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:
verses.ct: the one who made heaven and earth, the sea, and everything in them — the one who remains faithful forever,

verses.kjv: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The LORD looseth the prisoners:
verses.ct: who brings justice for those who are oppressed, who provides food for those who are hungry. The LORD sets captives free.

verses.kjv: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous:
verses.ct: The LORD gives sight to the blind. The LORD lifts up those who are crushed under burdens. The LORD loves those who live righteously.

verses.kjv: The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
verses.ct: The LORD watches over foreigners and supports orphans and widows, but he ruins the plans of the wicked.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: The LORD will rule forever — your God, O Zion — through every generation. Praise the LORD!
